- Shamrock ceremony traditions[6][17]

The press conference occurred as scheduled at 5 PM ET on March 12, meeting all resolution criteria. With verifiable instances exceeding the 10-count threshold through primary sources including official transcripts and video evidence[12][14][15], this satisfies the p2 ("Yes") resolution condition.
